website_summaries.verdict: When you need to save money on your scoreboard, this non-digital board is simply designed, but perfect for indoor use.
pros: Simple design that anyone can operate
Doesn't need an electrical power source, so it can be used anywhere
Very inexpensive, especially compared to electronic boards
Clear numbers against a white background are easy to read from a distance
Flattens to less than 1" in thickness for easy storage and transport
cons: Can't match the features found with electronic scoreboards, like time keeping and a buzzer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: I got sick of telling all the other parents what the score was during softball games, so I bought this. It's pretty great with the exception of the HUGE yellow rings that the numbers slide over. Why are they so damn big?! They're awkward and make storage difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Arroz

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: It was the cheapest scoreboard I could find to use with my cornhole set. It works quite well for what it is. I have two issues with it though. First, the bottom nut for one of the feet was missing when I received it. I contacted the seller and they promptly sent me out a new set of feet and nuts. The reason I deducted one star is because the yellow rings are made of plastic and the seam where they clasp together has roughly molded edges, which catch when the numbers are flipped over, which is rather annoying when flipping them over.
customer_reviews.author: Paul K

customer_reviews.title: Great bocce scoreboard
customer_reviews.text: Our bocce court had a scoreboard that one could hardly see. This large scoreboard fit the bill. The letters are large and everyone can see the score. Wish the numbers were duplicated on the back or rather a separate set. It would have been nice to turn over the number for the audience to see and have the same number on the back side for the scorer to see. We prop this scoreboard on top of our old one and it works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: thin materials.
customer_reviews.text: super thin metal, mine arrived bent up pretty good but i was able to bend it back by hand. Main down fall with these is that the numbers are paper thin...I mean really paper thin so the wind catches them like crazy and i feel that this thing wont last more then a few outdoor events. We will see.
customer_reviews.author: EliteEventServices

customer_reviews.title: they were perfect for what I needed them for and will use ...
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a 3-3 basketball tourney and they worked perfectly. When they arrived, I did have to put the screw "feet" back on though as they were loose in the box. Other than a little assembly, they were perfect for what I needed them for and will use them again shortly in another tournament.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Martin

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled
customer_reviews.text: This may be a first, but my committee bought this to use as a graduation year marker for class photos taken at an All-Alumni Reunion. I will customize it a bit by covering the blue background with gold cardstock (school colors red and gold). We'll put dowel through the rings for classmates to hold onto during photo. Flip for next year - easy peasy!!!! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Dian C. Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Cool.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my husband to go with the cornhole set I got him. It's just perfect. We have also learned that we can use it with several games. We also use it in darts, and air hockey. Numbers are very easy to flip. Nice fold-up construction for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Simon

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I really should have listened to the reviews and NOT bought this. It doesn’t stand up, little pieces are always coming apart from it, and it wasn’t worth a single cent that I paid for it. Skip this one and save your money!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine E. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: What more you want? It’s a score keeper!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my use, I plan on using it at the park with family to play horseshoes. My brother and I can’t seem to remember Jack! Especially after a drink or smoke 😆 So this is the official score keeper, no more wasting time, giving away or losing points to satisfy the other person. Also, I removed the giant yellow rings. They seem to get in the way of packing it away. I just used some zip ties and it’s 100% better. Folds perfect, functions perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Wanted a tabletop score pad and this was perfect.. Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a tabletop score pad and this was perfect..Good Quality..Large numbers..HOWEVER..my product came with a leg off(my son fixed it because we wanted it for an upcoming game) and I emailed the company about the problem BUT they NEVER got back to me..so I reduced my stars for this reason only.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Soly

customer_reviews.title: If an adult was carefully turning the score this likely wouldn't happen (so if that's what you're buying for you're probably fine. ) My kids use it and they're not ...
customer_reviews.text: Two of the yellow rings broke within 2 weeks. If an adult was carefully turning the score this likely wouldn't happen (so if that's what you're buying for you're probably fine.) My kids use it and they're not that careful, but our other flip scoreboard is 6 months old with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made but priced accordingly
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit bulky with the oversized rings and the metal tent has sharp edges and is very flimsy. The 1st shipment was missing one of the legs on the bottom of the tent so returned it. The 2nd shipment was missing the nut that screws on the leg but fortunately I had one that fit. It's not a very well made product, but it *is* cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose but a little flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Like that it will serve its purpose Dislike the thinness of the number cards and would prefer metal hoops, as the cards get stuck on the plastic connector. Will probably swap them out.
customer_reviews.author: StinkyLu

customer_reviews.title: but it's good for a quick solution
customer_reviews.text: A little tricky to turn the numbers at times, but it's good for a quick solution. Helps me and others to remember the score while playing a game.
customer_reviews.author: MJ48

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected, very easy to use. Large enough to be read in the court from any where. Never knew they made stuff like this, very excited and cant wait to use it at our next tournament.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about 2 years, and then the sheets started to wear off and fall apart...although I have to admit it was stading in the sun and rain everyday for 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Vetea Ribet

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Score board works good, no problems. Sturdy enough for the price. Easy to keep clean from sticky fingers. Would recommend for anyone needing to have a quick way to keep score without depending on pencil and paper.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Mae

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We used it as soon as we received to keep score for cornhole....works perfect!!

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This score keeper is PERFECT! Exactly what I was looking for. Can stand up on its own which is nice. Has plenty of numbers so it can work for almost any sport. Awesome
customer_reviews.author: mjsunny

customer_reviews.title: It met my needs and was a good buy, reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: It met my needs and was a good buy, reasonably priced. Only things that would make it better would be hinges to keep it open (is closes sometimes when changing the score), and edge protectors ( the folded metal edges and hard and could be sharp). But I'm sure these additional features would bring up the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Simple Score
customer_reviews.text: Every portable and easy to use. Stores flat for easy storage. Let's see how how it lasts with normal use.

customer_reviews.text: Nice and compact and affordable. Not the easiest to flip but well worth the low price.

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again!!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't hold up well!! I left this out in the sun and rain and it was a mess when I picked it up... Will not buy again!!

customer_reviews.title: Made to Last
customer_reviews.text: I am a athletic director and I got these for my school incase our digital score board went out. It happended last season and I want to be ready this time. Sturdy Product made to last

customer_reviews.title: Not for use outdoors; yellow ring clips made of a very cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: My son left his out in the weather a few times, well probably more than a few times but never in direct sunlight and the yellow ring clips all snapped, cracked or plain broke off within 2.5 months. I had to purchase metal ring clips to replace them to even get it functional again. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: neila balfour

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this. We have the game corn hole and this is how we keep score and the numbers are pretty large

customer_reviews.title: It worked ok for the intended purpose only drawback was ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked ok for the intended purpose only drawback was the letters are not heavy enough. Used this item outside and the wind kept blowing the number.

The scoreboard backing is a thin tin and came bent. The plastic numbers have scratches across them. This was probably an item someone returned and they just put it back on the shelf. Of all the items I have purchased over the years from Amazon, this is the most disappointing.

product_meta.title: Crown Sporting Goods Portable Table Top Scoreboard | Easy-Flip Indoor/Outdoor Scorekeeper | Professional/Recreational Coach and Referee Gear for Any Sport: Basketball, Football, Baseball, and More
product_meta.description:
Size:Original version

Who's Keeping Score?

Ever wonder who is keeping score? You are! Follow the play by play as you record each and every score in real time with a multisport easy-flip tabletop scoreboard. This scoreboard keeps track of the score with an easy flip, no more malfunctioning buttons and electronic nightmares!

These scoreboards are incredibly portable and lightweight, so you can take them to home games or on the road. Our scoreboards have a tabletop design with a convenient size of 14.5" wide, 7" tall, but flattens to under 1" thick. It has long-lasting, lightweight metal construction and can handle accidents on the court or on the field.

Why You'll Love It

These scorekeepers can be used for virtually any sport: basketball, football, baseball, softball, hockey, soccer, volleyball, rugby, lacrosse, field hockey, cricket, and some aquatic team sports. In fact, I've even heard you professional and recreational cornhole players are using these for cornhole scoreboards. It's great for college, high school, travel team, and any other leagues. And yes, you guessed it, they're battery free and electronic free, just pull it out of the box and get tallying. Spend less time thinking about buttons and more time watching the games!
feature_bullets: PORTABLE TABLETOP SCOREBOARD: Portable, tabletop design: 14.5" wide, 7" tall, but flattens to under 1" thick. Take it to home and road games
BOLD, CLEAR NUMBERS: Clear red and black numbers, able to be read from anywhere on the field or court. Always know how the game is going
ANY GAME WITH POINTS: Ideal for basketball, football, volleyball, ultimate frisbee, just about any competitive sport and tailgating games

EASY-FLIP SCORING: 2" ridged rings make for smooth score changes, with numbers reaching 99-99 Long-lasting, lightweight metal construction with yellow flip rings. Built to last for many seasons to come

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars362 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
